nodes.text: Filordis was an Inner Rim astronomical object located in the grid square N-8 of the Standard Galactic Grid.

Filordis was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 30, 2015. The world Filordis was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the Living Force Campaign Guide, a 2001 sourcebook authored by Robert Wiese and Andy Collins for use with the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
